description_title: THE MOUNTAIN YOU WANT IS WITHIN YOUR REACH
description: Fusion Pro goes in line with your love of the outdoors. Enjoying nature is everyone's right and our wide variety of Mountains allows you to find the ideal model for you to do it too. Resistant, solid, with high-end details and designs that invite you to drop everything in your search for a healthier and happier life.
name: FUSION PRO 350

description_title: AN ENTIRE LINE DESIGNED SO THAT THE CITY IS YOUR BEST HABITAT
description: Vittoria is the fusion of the most genuine European aesthetics with the latest technology. The aluminum frame, the latest generation gears and its narrow wheels to achieve greater acceleration, are designed so that this model adapts naturally to the habitat and demands of modern cities.
name: VITTORIA

description_title: AN ENTIRE LINE DESIGNED SO THAT THE CITY IS YOUR BEST HABITAT
description: Times in the city are fast and our urban variety has a range of models, designed exclusively for you to move with fluidity. Travel from the most classic to the most sophisticated, and climb to a better quality of life.

description: Our goal is to revolutionize the bike market so that extreme sports are not just for a few. That is why we design various models, from different ranges, but with a single identity that represents them, the guarantee and robustness so that you do not stop improving yourself.
